rukus.text: Hijuru no nakama mo shito-tachi o usotsuki to shite kyohi shita
Ware wa kare-ra ni waga shuju no shirushi o kudashitaga, kare-ra wa sorera o sake (te mushi shi)ta
Kare-ra wa (iwa) yama ni ie o horikomi, anzendearu to kangaete ita
Soredearu Cho, hitokoe (chobatsu) ga, kare-ra o osotte
kare-ra ga (tokubetsu no chishiki to gijutsu de) kizuki itonande ita koto wa, kare-ra ni totte nani mo yakudatanakatta

Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tada shinri ni motodzuite sozo shita. (Shinpan no)-ji wa hontoni kite iru noda. Dakara anata wa nasakebukaku kan'yo ni (hitobito no kashitsu ya ketten o) yurushite yaru ga i
Hontoni anata no omo wa, ban'yu o sozo shita zenchi no okata de ara reru
Ware wa taezu kurikaesa rerubeki 7tsu (no setsu) to, idaina kuruan o anata ni sazuketa

Ano mono-tachi no nan'ninka ni ware ga sazuketa tanoshimi ni taishite urayamashi-so ni shite wa naranai. Soshite sore ni kokoro o itamete wa naranai. Sore yori anata no tsubasa o hikuku (shite yasashiku) shi nasai
Soshite itte yaru ga i. `Hontoni watashi wa komeina keikoku-shadearu
(Keiji o katte ni) bunkatsu shita mono ni taishite mo, ware wa keiji shite oita
Sunawachi kuruan o (kare-ra no tsugo no yoi yo ni) danpen ni shita-sha-tachi ni mo
Sore de, anata no omo ni chikaite, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra subete o jinmon surudearou
Kare-ra ga okonatta subete no koto ni tsui te
Dakara anata ga meiji rareta koto o sen'yo shi nasai. Soshite tashinkyo to kara tozakare
Hontoni ware wa, chosho suru mono ni taishi, anata o jubun ni mamotte yaru
Kare-ra wa, arra ni soto no kami o haisuruga, mamonaku shirudearou
Ware wa kare-ra no kuchi ni suru koto de, anata no mune ga shimetsuke rareru no o shitte iru
Dakara, anata no omo o tataete 唱念 Shi, sajida shite
sadame no toki ga otozureru made, anata no omo ni tsukae nasai
